mapper.select: SELECT PROMOTION_CD FROM ( SELECT PROMOTION_CD AS PROMOTION_CD FROM SA_0113T WHERE 1=1 AND DLR_CD = #{dlrCd} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT SA0114.DLR_CD,SA0114.PROMOTION_CD,SA0114.CUST_CD ,SA0114.REG_USR_ID,SA0114.REG_DT,SA0114.UPDT_USR_ID,SA0114.UPDT_DT ,(SELECT CUST_NM FROM CR_0101T WHERE DLR_CD = SA0114.DLR_CD AND CUST_NO = SA0114.CUST_CD) AS CUST_NM FROM SA_0114T SA0114 WHERE 1=1 AND SA0114.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND SA0114.PROMOTION_CD = #{sPromotionCd}

SELECT SA0115.DLR_CD,SA0115.PROMOTION_CD,SA0115.MODEL_CD ,(SELECT MODEL_NM FROM SA_0102T WHERE DLR_CD = SA0115.DLR_CD AND MODEL_CD = SA0115.MODEL_CD) AS MODEL_NM ,FN_GET_MODEL_NM(SA0115.MODEL_CD) AS MODEL_CD_NM ,SA0115.REG_USR_ID,SA0115.REG_DT,SA0115.UPDT_USR_ID,SA0115.UPDT_DT FROM SA_0115T SA0115 WHERE 1=1 AND SA0115.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND SA0115.PROMOTION_CD = #{sPromotionCd}
